allow: Bash(for file in outil.html apropos.html contact.html faq.html)

Bash(do sed -i 's|<link rel=\""stylesheet\"" href=\""assets/css/animations\.css\"">|<link rel=\""stylesheet\"" href=\""assets/css/animations.css\"">\n    <link rel=\""stylesheet\"" href=\""assets/css/utilities.css\"">|' "$file")
